class AsyncFileASGIHandler[source]

AsyncFileASGIHandler() :: ASGIHandler

Handler for ASGI requests.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
class Response:
    is_async = True
    stream_called = False

    def __init__(self, content):
        self.content = content

    async def stream(self, send):
        self.stream_called = True
        return await send(self.content)


async def send(data):
    return data

%env DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE example.settings
import django

django.setup()
app = AsyncFileASGIHandler()
content = "<h1>Content!</h1>"
response = Response(content)
returned_content = await app.send_response(response, send)
assert response.stream_called
assert content == returned_content

env: DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=example.settings
{% endraw %}
